verbs.description: ivory coast [V: ruling] [ARG0: coalition] wins majority in local vote ivory coast president alassane ouattara ruling alliance won a majority in local elections that were contested by its former coalition partner as political divisions in the world biggest cocoa grower widen ahead of a 2020 presidential vote bloomberg
